definition: pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: I knew that. The pointees are separate.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，指针数据是分开的。

sentences.english: There are three hands in a clock.
Overwriting a function pointer or exception handler that is subsequently executed.
sentences.chinese: 重写随后执行的函数指针或异常处理程序。

sentences.english: The instrument can replace the multi-block pointer meters to complete the same functions.
sentences.chinese: 该仪表可取代多块指针仪表，完成相同功能。

sentences.english: Since there is no pointer, used a lot of static varia …
sentences.chinese: 由于没有指针，使用了大量静态变量。

sentences.english: When the clock hand reached and collects the magnets - the assignments are due.
sentences.chinese: 当时钟指针到达并收集了这些磁铁，就该交作业了。

sentences.english: Move pointer to next element and return that object.
sentences.chinese: 将指针移至下一个元素并返回该对象。

sentences.english: Does the direction of the compass needle change?
sentences.chinese: 指南针的指针方向会改变吗？

sentences.english: Why is it reccomended to set a pointer to null after deleting it?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要推荐后删除它设置一个指针为空？

sentences.english: The needle on the compass is pointing directly north.
sentences.chinese: 指南针上的指针正直接对着北方。

sentences.english: Then right-click while the pointer is over the list of documents.
sentences.chinese: 然后当鼠标指针在文档列表上时右击。

sentences.english: Now, I have to do the merging so I do pointer, pointer.
sentences.chinese: 下面进行合并，同样用指针。

sentences.english: Returning a pointer to static data may cause a function to be non-reentrant.
sentences.chinese: 返回指向静态数据的指针可能会导致函数不可重入。

sentences.english: Pointers provide for machine-independent address arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 指针可以提供独立于机器的地址运算。

sentences.english: The arrows in this diagram represent pointers to the location of the next node in memory.
sentences.chinese: 图中的箭头表示指向内存中下一个节点位置的指针。

sentences.english: SIS : Shimano Index System. Their name for basic click shifting.
sentences.chinese: 意为“喜玛诺指针系统”，是基本的点击变速。

definition: variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
